TextString.Name: TrofieBasilPestoDescription
TextString.String: Pesto is a typical Italian sauce made with basil.

TextString.Name: CarbonaraDescription
TextString.String: The carbonara is one of the most desecrated Italian dishes. The actual recipe only includes egg yolks, pecorino cheese, guanciale and black pepper.

TextString.Name: CapreseSaladDescription
TextString.String: The caprese salad is a simple recipe made of tomatoes and buffalo mozzarella.

TextString.Name: CheeseOmeletteDescription
TextString.String: A French classic in one of its most common variants.

TextString.Name: CheeseSouffleDescription
TextString.String: A classic French recipe with a unique texture. It requires patience and precision.

TextString.Name: LasagnaNapoletanaDescription
TextString.String: People in Naples decided to make their own lasagna, with ricotta and meatballs.

TextString.Name: OssobucoMilaneseDescription
TextString.String: A popular recipe from Milan, consisting of a cow vertebra and the surrounding meat.

TextString.Name: OnionSoupDescription
TextString.String: A classic soup, which may be really hard to make if you've had a bad day.

TextString.Name: QuicheLorraineDescription
TextString.String: A classic French recipe, modified by the English to include Bacon.

TextString.Name: RatatouilleDescription
TextString.String: The Ratatouille is a French Provençal recipe made of stewed vegetables.

TextString.Name: RibollitaDescription
TextString.String: A famous Tuscan bread soup, full of vegetables.

TextString.Name: RisottoPorciniDescription
TextString.String: A simple yet delicious risotto recipe, including expensive mushrooms.

TextString.Name: TagliatelleBologneseDescription
TextString.String: Originally made in Bologna, the tagliatelle alla bolognese is a famous meat-based pasta recipe.

TextString.Name: TartifletteDescription
TextString.String: Originated in the Alpine territory, this dish is made of potatoes, cheese, lard, and onions.

TextString.Name: TortelliniBrothDescription
TextString.String: Native to the Italian region of Emilia, the tortellini are a really small kind of stuffed pasta, usually served in broth.

TextString.Name: BucatiniAmatricianaDescription
TextString.String: A classic Italian recipe based on guanciale, pecorino cheese and tomato. No onions allowed.

TextString.Name: SpaghettiClamsDescription
TextString.String: A simple pasta recipe that allows clams to unleash all of their unique flavor.

TextString.Name: SteakTartareDescription
TextString.String: A meat dish made of raw ground meat sliced in small pieces and often flavored with any sort of sides and sauces.

TextString.Name: KungPaoChickenDescription
TextString.String: The kung pao chicken is a spicy, stir-fried Chinese recipe originated in the Sichuan Province.

TextString.Name: BlanquetteVeauDescription
TextString.String: A French veal ragout cooked in a way so as to make it as white as possible. Is this racist?

TextString.Name: PastaNormaDescription
TextString.String: A Sicilian pasta recipe made with tomatoes, dried ricotta and fried eggplants.

TextString.Name: PikePerchQuenellesDescription
TextString.String: Quenelles made of fish, served with a seafood sauce.

TextString.Name: AranciniDescription
TextString.String: Sicilian fried rice balls hiding a surprise sauce.

TextString.Name: CannoliDescription
TextString.String: A classic Sicilian dessert consisting of a fried crunchy tube filled with ricotta.

TextString.Name: VeganLasagnaDescription
TextString.String: Lasagna is good and vegans deserve to have their own variant.

TextString.Name: PannacottaDescription
TextString.String: A classic Italian dessert made of cooked cream, hence the name: panna (cream) cotta (cooked). Yeah, very original...

TextString.Name: EggplantParmesanDescription
TextString.String: An Italian recipe made with eggplants, mozzarella, parmesan, tomato sauce and basil.

TextString.Name: CanederliMushroomsDescription
TextString.String: An Alpine recipe consisting of bread dumplings served alongside tasty mushrooms.

TextString.Name: BabaDescription
TextString.String: A classic fried dessert from Naples, flavored with rum. Ideal for getting drunk as early in the morning as possible.

TextString.Name: VealStewDescription
TextString.String: Stewed veal cooked with different vegetables until the meat is soft and tasty.

TextString.Name: CaciuccoDescription
TextString.String: A Tuscan soup made with different kinds of seafood, usually served with bread.

TextString.Name: ApplePieDescription
TextString.String: The most classic of all pies - the apple pie!

TextString.Name: BarbecueRibsDescription
TextString.String: Pork ribs cooked until the meat is soft but still wet, flavored with barbecue sauce.

TextString.Name: CaesarSaladDescription
TextString.String: An American classic - a salad made with romaine lettuce, croutons and a unique sauce.

TextString.Name: CheeseburgerDescription
TextString.String: The most famous and appreciated burger, full of creamy cheese.

TextString.Name: CrabCakesDescription
TextString.String: An American recipe consisting of crab meat mixed with other ingredients and cooked in various ways.

TextString.Name: CreamyPotatoSaladDescription
TextString.String: While this recipe is still considered a salad, the fact that it's filled with mayonnaise makes it a rather unhealthy choice.

TextString.Name: GrilledSalmonDescription
TextString.String: Sometimes salmon is so good that it only needs to be grilled and served with a little seasoning.

TextString.Name: GrilledSteakDescription
TextString.String: Grilled steaks come in thousands of varieties and are popular all around the world.

TextString.Name: KeyLimePieDescription
TextString.String: An American dessert made of key lime juice, egg yolks and condensed milk.

TextString.Name: PulledPorkDescription
TextString.String: It's basically slow-cooked pork meat that is wrecked before you eat it. But it's so good!

TextString.Name: RedVelvetDescription
TextString.String: A traditional red-colored chocolate cake, usually served on Christmas or Valentine's Day.

TextString.Name: RedBeansRiceDescription
TextString.String: "Red Beans and Ricely Yours" - Louis Armstrong's favorite recipe.

TextString.Name: SurfTurfDescription
TextString.String: Seafood and red meat together. An explosion of taste.

TextString.Name: OystersRockfellerDescription
TextString.String: Oysters topped with a rich sauce made from butter, parsley and other green herbs.

TextString.Name: MapleBakedBeansDescription
TextString.String: Maple syrup, mustard, ginger. A real bomb!

TextString.Name: MapoTofuDescription
TextString.String: Tofu served in a spicy sauce with douchi and soybean paste.

TextString.Name: YuXiangDescription
TextString.String: Stir-fried crispy eggplant cooked with a rich, spicy and sweet sauce from Sichuan.

TextString.Name: SpicyTanTanSoupDescription
TextString.String: Sichuan noodle dish with pork mince, sesame and spicy chili broth.

TextString.Name: TeaLeafEggsDescription
TextString.String: Hard-boiled eggs with the subtle flavor of anise and the deep brown hues of black tea and soy.

TextString.Name: ClamSyceeDescription
TextString.String: Clams stuffed with a clam and pork mixture. Traditional New Year's dish from China.

TextString.Name: MooncakesDescription
TextString.String: Traditional Chinese dessert with a rich thick filling, usually made from lotus seed paste, surrounded by a thin crust.

TextString.Name: RedBeanSoupDescription
TextString.String: A Chinese banquet dessert with orange peels and lotus seeds.

TextString.Name: MangoLoMaiChiDescription
TextString.String: Pastry made of rice flour, mangoes and coconut.

TextString.Name: PaellaDescription
TextString.String: Does paella really need a description?

TextString.Name: GazpachoDescription
TextString.String: Traditional cold soup made of raw, blended vegetables.

TextString.Name: BacalaPilPilDescription
TextString.String: Traditional seafood dish from the Basque Country.

TextString.Name: CocidoMadrilenoDescription
TextString.String: Chickpea-based stew from Madrid. You can find anything on your plate.

TextString.Name: GalicianStyleOctopusDescription
TextString.String: A popular tapa with octopus, potatoes and paprika.

TextString.Name: TortillaPatateDescription
TextString.String: A traditional omelette made with eggs and potatoes.

TextString.Name: AsparagusEggsDescription
TextString.String: A tasty appetizer with scrambled eggs.

TextString.Name: JamonTapasDescription
TextString.String: Tapas made with one of the most expensive hams in the world.

TextString.Name: PiperradaDescription
TextString.String: Typical Basque dish prepared with onion, green peppers and sautéed tomatoes.

TextString.Name: CremaCatalanaDescription
TextString.String: Brûlée or Catalana? Can we really trust the French after they stole the Gioconda from us?

TextString.Name: BunuelosVientoDescription
TextString.String: Cream puff batter that bakes like a popover.

TextString.Name: HuevosFlamencaDescription
TextString.String: Eggs served with potatoes and vegetables. Do yourself a favor and go to Sevilla.

TextString.Name: BienmesabeDescription
TextString.String: Dessert prepared with honey, egg yolk and almonds. The name literally means "it tastes good!"

TextString.Name: GardenSaladDescription
TextString.String: Made with anything you can find in your garden.

TextString.Name: IrishStewDescription
TextString.String: A traditional folk dish made with meat and vegetables.

TextString.Name: SeaBreamFilletDescription
TextString.String: Some parsley, a drop of lemon, and even the most boring fillet comes to life.

TextString.Name: GrilledTunaDescription
TextString.String: Tuna is also perfect for barbecue.

TextString.Name: BeverageWaterDescription
TextString.String: A bottle of water! What did you expect?

TextString.Name: BeverageWhiteWineDescription
TextString.String: A bottle of white wine! What did you expect?

TextString.Name: BeverageRedWinepDescription
TextString.String: A bottle of red wine! What did you expect?

TextString.Name: BouillabaisseDescription
TextString.String: Traditional Provençal fish stew originating from the port city of Marseille.

TextString.Name: RoastedChickenGarlicDescription
TextString.String: Not a good thing to eat if you're planning on kissing someone. But who'd want to kiss people and miss out on eating this delicious chicken?

TextString.Name: CoqVinDescription
TextString.String: Wine and rooster. The French might even know what they're doing.

TextString.Name: EscargotsDescription
TextString.String: Snails cooked with butter, garlic and parsley.

TextString.Name: ProvencalStylePrawnsDescription
TextString.String: Prawns cooked with tomato, zucchini, garlic and onion.

TextString.Name: BeefWellingtonDescription
TextString.String: Fillet steak wrapped in puff pastry. Rordon Gamsay's best dish.

TextString.Name: FishChipsDescription
TextString.String: Fried battered fish and hot potato chips.

TextString.Name: JackedPotatoDescription
TextString.String: Open that potato and let me put everything in it. Wait, what?

TextString.Name: LambPieDescription
TextString.String: Nothing screams "Middle Ages" more than British pies.

TextStrings.TextString: SheperdPieDescription Nothing screams "Middle Ages" more than British pies.>

TextString.Name: RoastBeefYorkshirePuddingDescription
TextString.String: Beef roasted in the oven and served with yorkshire pudding.

TextString.Name: PorkPieDescription
TextString.String: A pie filled with pork mince. Also the name of Walter White's hat.

TextString.Name: ScotchEggsDescription
TextString.String: Hard-boiled egg wrapped in sausage meat, coated in bread crumbs and deep-fried. Did you hear that?! My God!

TextString.Name: PottedShrimpsDescription
TextString.String: One of James Bond's favorite dishes.

TextString.Name: HaggisDescription
TextString.String: Savory pudding containing sheep's pluck, cooked encased in the animal's stomach. A bit awkward, but tasty.

TextString.Name: RumbledethumpsDescription
TextString.String: A traditional dish from the Scottish Borders with potato, cabbage and onion.

TextString.Name: BlackBunDescription
TextString.String: A fruit cake with raisins, currants, almonds, allspice, ginger, cinnamon and more. Yeah, the Scottish are strange people.

TextString.Name: BarbecuedPiggyScallopsDescription
TextString.String: Scallops mixed with parsley and butter, wrapped in bacon. Damn, if I'm hungry now.

TextString.Name: BigosBreadBowlDescription
TextString.String: Stew of sauerkraut braised with meat, served in a bread bowl.

TextString.Name: CabbageRollsDescription
TextString.String: Cabbage leaves wrapped around a filling of pork and rice.

TextString.Name: BrigandPancakeDescription
TextString.String: >Thick goulash laid on a potato pancake.

TextString.Name: SmokedTroutSaladDescription
TextString.String: Salad with trout, onion, celery, mayonnaise, sour cream and lemon juice.

TextString.Name: BeefRollsDescription
TextString.String: Tender pieces of beef wrapped around cheese and vegetables.

TextString.Name: GreekStyleFishDescription
TextString.String: Fried fillets of fish with tomato, onion, parsley and celery.

TextString.Name: PolishGulashDescription
TextString.String: Polish version of the goulash, with beef, mushrooms, onion and tomato.

TextString.Name: PierogiDescription
TextString.String: Traditional polish dumplings filled with sauerkraut and porcini mushrooms.

TextString.Name: GelfiteFishDescription
TextString.String: Carp, whitefish, or pike, traditionally served as an appetizer in Ashkenazi Jewish households.

TextString.Name: SmalecDescription
TextString.String: Flavored pork fat with pork pieces.

TextString.Name: SpringRollsDescription
TextString.String: Savory rolls with cabbage and other vegetable fillings inside a thinly-wrapped cylindrical pastry.

TextString.Name: HongKongSweetSourDescription
TextString.String: Succulent pork pieces with pineapple, peppers and sweet and sour sauce.

TextString.Name: PekingDuckDescription
TextString.String: Prepared since the imperial era (1330 B.C.), the meat is characterized by its thin, crisp skin.

TextString.Name: JiaoziDescription
TextString.String: The legendary Chinese stuffed pasta. These meat-and-vegetable-filled delicacies are one of the most popular dishes in Asian cuisine.

TextString.Name: AppleCreamPieDescription
TextString.String: A soft pie filled with apple cream.

TextString.Name: BananaBreadHoneyDescription
TextString.String: Soft banana bread with honey seasoning.

TextString.Name: ButterCookiesDescription
TextString.String: Simple cookies made with butter and love.

TextString.Name: ChocolateCookiesDescription
TextString.String: Classic butter cookies with chocolate chips.

TextString.Name: RoastedPotatoesDescription
TextString.String: Sliced potatoes roasted in the oven until they are crunchy and tasty.

TextString.Name: MusselsSoupDescription
TextString.String: A simple seafood soup made with mussels.

TextString.Name: TomatoSoupDescription
TextString.String: A light and refreshing soup made with tomatoes and potatoes.

TextString.Name: GarlicPotatoSoupDescription
TextString.String: A potato soup flavored with garlic and pepper.

TextString.Name: CodSaladDescription
TextString.String: A salad made with lettuce, tomatoes, potatoes and cod.

TextString.Name: LightSaladDescription
TextString.String: A simple salad made with common vegetables.

TextString.Name: TurkeySaladDescription
TextString.String: A rich salad made with turkey and vegetables.

TextString.Name: ButterPastaDescription
TextString.String: A very simple pasta recipe seasoned with butter and black pepper.

TextString.Name: ClassicTomatoPastaDescription
TextString.String: A classic pasta recipe with tomato sauce, parmesan and basil.

TextString.Name: ParmesanSaucePastaDescription
TextString.String: A simple yet very popular pasta recipe with a sauce made using butter and parmesan.

TextString.Name: TomatoPastaDescription
TextString.String: A simple pasta recipe with tomato sauce.

TextString.Name: FriedRicePrawnsDescription
TextString.String: Sautéed rice with prawns and garlic.

TextString.Name: FishFilletWithOnionsDescription
TextString.String: A roasted cod fillet with crunchy onions.

TextString.Name: FishFilletWithSaladDescription
TextString.String: A cod fillet with salad dressing.

TextString.Name: RoastedChickenBreastDescription
TextString.String: A simple roasted chicken breast with salad dressing.

TextString.Name: SteakAndPotatoesDescription
TextString.String: A simple roasted beef steak served with potatoes.

TextString.Name: RoastedOnionsCheeseDescription
TextString.String: Some roasted onions with tasty cheese cream.
